column4: would it be possible to install ubuntu with debian boot floppies? and then when you run /usr/sbin/base-config, just put in ubuntu repos instead of deb?<
would it be possible to install ubuntu with debian boot floppies? and then when you run /usr/sbin/base-config, just put in ubuntu repos instead of deb?<
there are some articeles in wiki.ubuntu.com for that issue
you may use "floppy" or "floppies" as search string
